relevant_findings.abdominal_examination: Mild tenderness on the right side on palpation
relevant_findings.psychiatric_exam: Limited eye contact, mumbling speech, poor concentration, depressed mood with a congruent affect, poor insight and judgment

relevant_findings.elbow_exam: Olecranon process appeared to protrude posteriorly and medially without ecchymosis; patient unable to move the arm at the elbow

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Repeated act of self-harm reported with each dislocation
